title: When you look at the assassin update roster and realize...
body:
There are no demacian champions on there haha

FEELSGOODMAN

replies.body: Are there any Demacian assassins? And no, Vayne doesn't count.

Yeeeah, they aren't assassins.

Kayle's something of her own class but she has no dashes or blinks.

Quinn's a marksman with a slight of fighter.

kayle was a joke kinda.
and if twitch is an assassin, quinn is an assassin.

The reason why Twitch is half assassin is because he has a stealth. Quinn is a survivalist with her vaults and blinds to shrug off melee attempts to kill her, but that's not blowing up squishies.

Yeah, there's really no Demacian assassins.

her vault and blind/nearsight reset her passive as well as having nice ad scalings, giving her good burst and sticking power, and her ult lets her chase down squishies on the map. have you ever been caught in a quinn combo as a squishy? I guarantee you it's not a pleasent adc slappy battle.

Quinn actually makes for a poor adc, despite having good harass. She naturally goes toplane where her foes are often melee so she can further harass them. And she's not an assassin, look up the class and subclass list.

yi is considered an assassin. the classes mean very little when you look at some kits. and quinn with her passive is very bursty and good at chasing and locking down targets. thusly I consider her an assassin, especially if twitch is considered one.
Whatever, clearly there's no changing your mind. (And Yi's a skirmishes, close, but not quite)
his character page clearly says assassin. of course he isn't, but that's how accurate the league classes can be. and I defy you to tell me quinn isn't bursty and sticky with a straight face.
Kled is sticky and bursty (assuming you're building him in the intended path) but he's not an assassin.
he also builds tank items. quinn goes full squish in order to deal relevant damage, which kled is not required to do.
He's actually _supposed_ to be a skirmisher, but because Riot revolved his entire kit around health, he's now a mobile tank.

his class still says assassin. tell me, does lower than average dps and short bursts of higher than average damage along with dueling power and all the burst being single target sound like a bad adc or an bursty assassin style adc to you?
Then a Demacian gets an Ultimate skin.

What you got against Demacians?

Also, there are no Demacian assassins.
